text: Kateryna Kozlova was the defending champion, but was facing a six month doping ban for taking a drug containing the banned substance 1,3-Dimethylbutylamine. Carina Witthöft won the title, defeating Johanna Larsson in the final, 6–3, 6–3. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == * Main draw Reinert Open - Singles
title: 2015 Reinert Open – Singles
